column1: income of judicial officers under and in terms of the Inland Revenue Act No. 24 of
2017 as amended by the Inland Revenue (Amendment) Act No. 45 of 2022;
(d) grant and issue the following interim orders;
directing  the  above-named  respondents  or  any  one  and/or  more  of  them  to
immediately  return  any  Advance  Personal  Income  Tax  (APIT)  monies  which  are
deducted from the income and/or any part of the said income of judicial officers
under and in terms of the Inland Revenue Act No. 24 of 2017 as amended by the
Inland Revenue (Amendment) Act No. 45 of 2022, if any subsequent to the filing
of this application, until the final determination of this application.
